languages.text: {n}Друкари лениво растягивает шею.{/n} "Когда-нибудь я устану от таращащихся мон-кай и начну прививать им почтение".
{n}Marazhai idly stretches his neck.{/n} "One day I will grow tired of being stared at by the mon-keigh and start teaching them some respect."
languages.original_text: {n}Друкари лениво растягивает шею.{/n} "Когда-нибудь я устану от таращащихся мон-кай и начну прививать им почтение".

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai idly stretches his neck.{/n} "Some day I will grow tired of being ogled by the mon'keigh and start teaching them respect."

{n}Marazhai idly stretches his neck.{/n} "One day I will grow tired of being stared at by the mon'keigh and start teaching them some respect."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai estira el cuello distraídamente.{/n} «Un día me cansaré de las miradas de los mon-keigh y empezaré a inculcarles respeto».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai idly stretches his neck.{/n} "One day I will grow tired of being stared at by the mon-keigh and start teaching them some respect."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai estira el cuello distraídamente.{/n} «Un día me cansaré de las miradas de los mon'keigh y empezaré a inculcarles respeto».

languages.text: {n}マラズハイはのんびりと首を伸ばした。{/n} 「いつかモン＝ケイに睨まれるのに飽きて、彼らに敬意を教える日が来るでしょう」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai idly stretches his neck.{/n} "One day I will grow tired of being stared at by the mon-keigh and start teaching them some respect."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイはのんびりと首を伸ばした。{/n} 「いつかモンケイに睨まれるのに飽きて、彼らに敬意を教える日が来るでしょう」

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋懒洋洋地伸了伸脖子。{/n}“总有一天我会厌倦他们的目光，会教导他们什么叫做尊重。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai idly stretches his neck.{/n} "One day I will grow tired of being stared at by the mon-keigh and start teaching them some respect."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋懒洋洋地伸了伸脖子。{/n}“总有一天我会厌倦他们的目光，会教导他们什么叫做尊重。”

languages.text: {n}Marazhai streckt müde seinen Hals.{/n} "Eines Tages werde ich es leid sein, dass Chem-Pan-Sey mich anstarren, und ihnen ein wenig Respekt beibringen."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai idly stretches his neck.{/n} "One day I will grow tired of being stared at by the mon-keigh and start teaching them some respect."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai streckt müde seinen Hals.{/n} "Eines Tages werde ich es leid sein, dass Chem-Pan-Sey mich anstarren, und ihnen ein wenig Respekt beibringen."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai fait craquer sa nuque avec nonchalance.{/n} « Un jour, quand je me serai lassé des regards inquisiteurs des mon-keigh, je me ferai fort de leur enseigner le respect. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai idly stretches his neck.{/n} "One day I will grow tired of being stared at by the mon-keigh and start teaching them some respect."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai fait craquer sa nuque avec nonchalance.{/n} « Un jour, quand je me serai lassé des regards inquisiteurs des mon'keigh, je me ferai fort de leur enseigner le respect. »

languages.text: {n}Marazhai tembel tembel boynunu kaşıyor.{/n} "Bir gün mon-keighlerin bütün bu bakışlarından sıkılacağım ve onlara saygı göstermeyi öğretmeye başlayacağım."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai idly stretches his neck.{/n} "One day I will grow tired of being stared at by the mon-keigh and start teaching them some respect."
